thread.title: Scherzer jokingly pulls a Pabelbon, 'chokes' Harper
thread.title_full: Scherzer jokingly pulls a Pabelbon, 'chokes' Harper

author: Avery Stone
title: Scherzer jokingly pulls a Pabelbon, 'chokes' Harper
text:
Scherzer jokingly pulls a Pabelbon, 'chokes' Harper USA Today Sports 14 hrs ago Avery Stone It’s been less than a week since Jonathan Papelbon choked Bryce Harper during a fight in the Washington Nationals dugout. But apparently, Thursday night was not too soon for pitcher Max Scherzer to joke about it with Harper.
AdChoices Before facing the Atlanta Braves, the two finished off their pregame handshake with this.
Max Scherzer having some fun with Bryce Harper.This was the end of their handshake before tonight's #Nats ' game. pic.twitter.com/nCPSjVTat3
— FOX Sports: MLB (@MLBONFOX) October 1, 2015
@Max_Scherzer does his best Pap impression with @Bharper3407 Glad to see the fellas moving on. #natitude pic.twitter.com/TMlOtXdyRC
— Mark Jenkins (@STRTTRMJ) October 1, 2015
Now, it appears the two have done this move pre-Papelbon. For example, at the Nats’ game against the Braves on Sept. 5:
© Provided by USA Today Sports (AP Photo/Alex Brandon) But still, they could have given that particular motion a rest. They definitely have a sense of humor about the whole thing.
(Thanks to Bleacher Report for bringing this to our attention.)
